member.name: T:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration
member.summary: Fastlane deliver configuration options.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets file path to the application icon.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppId
member.summary: Gets or sets The app ID of the app you want to use/modify.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppleWatchIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets file path to the apple watch icon.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppRatingConfigPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the application rating configuration.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppReviewInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the application review information.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AppVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the application version that should be edited or created.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AutomaticRelease
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the app should be automatically released once it's approved.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.AutomaticReleaseDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date in milliseconds for automatically releasing on pending approval.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.BuildNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the build number (already uploaded to iTC) will be used instead of the current built one.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.Copyright
member.summary: Gets or sets the copyright.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the localized description.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.DevPortalTeamId
member.summary: Gets or sets your Developer Portal team, if you're in multiple teams. Different from your iTC team ID.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.DevPortalTeamName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of your Developer Portal team if you're in multiple teams.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.EditLive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable ipa upload and screenshot upload.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.IgnoreLanguageDirectoryValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore errors when invalid languages are found in metadata and screeenshot directories.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.IpaPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for the ipa.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.ItcProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider short name to be used with the iTMSTransporter to identify your team..

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.KeyWords
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of localized key words.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.Languages
member.summary: Gets or sets the languages.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.MarketingUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the localized marketing URL.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.MetaDataPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory path to the folder containing meta data.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the localized name.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.OverWriteScreenShots
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to clear all previously uploaded screenshots before uploading the new ones.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PhasedRelease
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the phased release feature of iTC.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PkgPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for the pkg.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PreCheckDefaultRuleLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the default rule level unless otherwise configured.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PreCheckIncludeInAppPurchases
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether precheck should check in-app purchases.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PriceTier
member.summary: Gets or sets the price tier of this application.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.PrimaryCategory
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the primary first sub category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the primary second sub category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the localized promotional text.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.ReleaseNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets the localized release notes.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.RunPreCheckBeforeSubmit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run precheck before submitting to app review.

member.summary: Gets or sets the directory path to the folder containing screen shots.

member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary first sub category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary second sub category.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.SkipAppVersionUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to update app version for submission.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneDeliverConfiguration.SkipBinaryUpload
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading an ipa or pkg to iTunes Connect.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to upload metadata.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether upload screen shots.

member.summary: Gets or sets the extra submission information.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to submit the new version for review after uploading everything.

member.summary: Gets or sets the localized subtitle. Note: subtitle must be a hash, with the language being the key.

member.summary: Gets or sets the localized support URL.

member.name: T:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration
member.summary: Fastlane match configuration options.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.CertificateType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the certificate.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.CloneBranchDirectly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to clone just the branch specified, instead of the whole repo. This requires that the branch already exists. Otherwise the command will fail.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.ForceForNewDevices
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to renew the provisioning profiles if the device count on the developer portal has changed.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.GitBranch
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific git branch to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.GitUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the git repo containing all the certificates.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.KeyChainName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the keychain the items should be imported to.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.KeyChainPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the key chain password.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [read only].

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.ShallowClone
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to make a shallow clone of the repository (truncate the history to 1 revision).

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.SkipConfirmation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.SkipDocs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip generation of a README.md for the created git repository.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to print out extra information and all commands.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneMatchConfiguration.Workspace
member.summary: Gets or sets the workspace.

member.name: T:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration
member.summary: Fastlane Pem configuration options.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.ActiveDaysLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the current certificate is active for less than this number of days, generate a new one.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.Development
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to renew the development push certificate instead of the production one.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the file name of the generated .pem file.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a new push certificate, even if the current one is active for 30 (or PEM_ACTIVE_DAYS_LIMIT) more days.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.GenerateP12
member.summary: Gets or sets a value determining whether to Generate a p12 file additionally to a PEM file.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a directory in which all certificates and private keys should be stored.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.P12Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password that is used for your p12 file.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePemConfiguration.SavePrivateKey
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to save the private RSA key.

member.name: T:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration
member.summary: Fastlane pilot configuration options.

member.name: M:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the command to run with pilot.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.IpaFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the ipa file to upload.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.ChangeLog
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'what's new' text when uploading a new build.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.BetaAppDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the beta app description when uploading a new build.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.BetaAppFeedbackEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets the beta app email when uploading a new build.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.SkipSubmission
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not distributing action of pilot and only upload the ipa file.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.SkipWaiting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to wait for the build to process. If set to true, the changelog won't be set, `distribute_external` option won't work and no build will be distributed to testers

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.AppleId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique App ID provided by App Store Connect.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.Distribute
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the build be distributed to external testers.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.Notify
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to notify external testers.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.DemoAccountRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you need a demo account for Apple review.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tester's first name.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tester's last name.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the tester's email.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.TesterFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to a CSV file of testers.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.WaitProcessingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval in seconds to wait for App Store Connect processing.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.PortalTeamId
member.summary: Gets or sets the short ID of your team in the developer portal, if you're in multiple teams. Different from your iTC team ID!".

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.ItcProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider short name to be used with the iTMSTransporter to identify your team. To get provider short name run `pathToXcode.app/Contents/Applications/Application\\ Loader.app/Contents/itms/bin/iTMSTransporter -m provider -u 'USERNAME' -p 'PASSWORD' -account_type itunes_connect -v off`. The short names of providers should be listed in the second column

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.Groups
member.summary: Gets or sets groups to associate tester to one group or more by group name / group id. E.g. `-g \"Team 1\",\"Team 2\"`

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.WaitForUploadedBuild
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use version info from uploaded ipa file to determine what build to use for distribution. If set to false, latest processing or any latest build will be used

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlanePilotConfiguration.RejectBuildWaitingForReview
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to expire previous build if it's 'waiting for review'.

member.name: T:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration
member.summary: Fastlane supply configuration options.

member.name: M:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.PackageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the package name of the application to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.Track
member.summary: Gets or sets the track of the application to use. The default available tracks are: #{default_tracks.join(', ')}.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.Rollout
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of the user fraction when uploading to the rollout track.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.MetadataPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory containing the metadata files.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.KeyFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the p12 file used to authenticate with Google.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.Issuer
member.summary: Gets or sets the issuer of the p12 file (email addressof the services account).

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.JsonKeyFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a file containing service account JSON, used to authenticate with Google.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.JsonKeyData
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw service account JSON data used to authenticate with Google.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.ApkFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the APK to upload.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.ApkFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of APK file paths to upload.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.AAB
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the AAB file to upload.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.SkipUploadApk
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading APK.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.SkipUploadAAB
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading AAB.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.SkipUploadMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading metadata.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.SkipUploadImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading images.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.SkipUploadScreenShots
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip uploading screen shots.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.PromoteTrack
member.summary: Gets or sets the track to promote to.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.ValidateOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to only validate changes with Google Play rather than actually publish.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.Mapping
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the mapping file to upload

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.RootUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the root URL for the Google Play API. The provided URL will be used for API calls in place of https://www.googleapis.com/"

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.CheckSupersededTracks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to check the other tracks for superseded versions and disable them.

member.name: P:Cake.Fastlane.FastlaneSupplyConfiguration.MappingFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of paths to mapping files to upload.
